Dialogue.Page: Hey, Hatchling! I made a weird discovery the other day that I thought you might be interested in.
When I was tuning my deep space radio, I picked up a strange signal from a nearby star system. It's unlike anything I've ever heard before from space!
Since your ship is equipped with that new "warp drive" technology now, I thought you might want to go check it out. I'm certainly curious about what's there.
Whether you decide to go or not, I've sent the coordinates of the star system to your ship computer.
